<p>这是模型管理界面，为了实现对多段参考音频分配情感设计，如果您只有一段可不使:
This is the model management interface. It allows you to assign emotions to multiple reference audio segments. If you only have one segment, you can skip using this interface.

If you have questions or need further information, please refer to the documentation: Click to view detailed documentation.
batch_size，1代表不并行，越大越快，但是越可能出问题: Batch Size: 1 means no parallel processing. Larger values are faster but more prone to issues.
json设置（一般不动）: JSON Settings (Do not change it unless you know what you are doing)
使用前，请确认后端服务已启动。: Before using, please ensure the backend service is running.
保存json\n（可能不会有完成提示，没报错就是成功）:
Save JSON
(There may not be a completion notice; no error means success)
参考音频在3~10秒范围外，请更换！: Reference audio is outside the 3-10 second range. Please replace it!
吞字漏字属于正常现象，太严重可尝试换行、加句号或调节batch size滑条。: Missing or swallowed words are normal. Severe issues can be resolved by adding new lines or periods, or adjusting the batch size.
吞字漏字属于正常现象，太严重可通过换行或加句号解决，或者更换参考音频（使用模型管: Missing or swallowed words are normal. Severe issues can be resolved by adding new lines or periods, changing the reference audio (using the model management interface), or adjusting the batch size.
您在使用经典推理模式，部分选项不可用: You are using Classic Inference Mode. Some options are unavailable.
我是一个粉刷匠，粉刷本领强。我要把那新房子，刷得更漂亮。刷了房顶又刷墙，刷子像飞: Five little monkeys jumping on the bed, one fell off and bumped his head. Mama called the doctor, and the doctor said, "No more monkeys jumping on the bed!"
找不到模型文件！请把有效文件放置在文件夹下！！！: Model file not found! Please place valid files in the folder!!!
若有疑问或需要进一步了解，可参考文档：: If you have questions or need further information, please refer to the documentation:
认证信息已启用，您可以在config.json中关闭。\n但是这个功能还没做好，:
Authentication is enabled. You can disable it in config.json.
However, this feature is not fully implemented yet and is just for show.
请修改后点击下方按钮进行保存: Please modify and click the button below to save
请求失败，请检查URL是否正确: Request Failed. Please check if the URL is correct.
这是一个由: This is a Inference Specialization Package provided by
这是一个配置文件适用于https://github.com/X-T-E-R/TT: This is a configuration file for https://github.com/X-T-E-R/TTS-for-GPT-soVITS, a simple and easy-to-use frontend and backend project
这是展示页面的版本，并未使用后端服务，下面参数无效。: This is a demonstration page version and does not utilize backend services, the parameters below are invalid.
